sentences.en: Additionally he implemented nutritional changes which included increased protein intake and specific nutritional supplementation.
sentences.cn: 另外加上改变营养,如提高蛋白摄入量和特殊营养的补充.

sentences.en: Dietary chicken egg - yolk antibodies or aureomycin supplementation could improved serum IGF - I levels of meat ducks.
sentences.cn: 日粮中添加卵黄抗体和金霉素可以提高肉鸭血清IGF-I水平.

sentences.en: Folic acid supplementation is used to improve erythropoiesis in chronic hemolytic anemia.
sentences.cn: 慢性溶血性贫血患者使用叶酸治疗可促进红细胞生成.

sentences.en: In addition to weight gain, most physicians recommend increasing vitamin supplementation by 50 % to 100 %.
sentences.cn: 除了体重增加, 大多数医生建议增加50%—100%的维生素补充.

sentences.en: Objective To study the effects of supplementation of protein diet on immune function in starvation rat.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨补充蛋白饮食改善饥饿大鼠机体免疫功能.

sentences.en: Objective: To study the effect of multi - micronutrients supplementation on nutritional status of children.
sentences.cn: 目的: 为研究复合微量营养素补充剂对儿童营养状况的影响.

sentences.en: Our results indicate that vitamin D supplementation may prevent reactivation of latent TB.
sentences.cn: 我们的研究结果表明维生素D添加剂可阻止潜伏期结核菌重激活.

sentences.en: Pawn business , as a resource for finance, is an effective and necessary supplementation for banking system.
sentences.cn: 典当业作为一种辅助性的融资手段, 是银行业务有效和必要的补充.

sentences.en: Randomized controlled trials are warranted to explore the effects of vitamin D supplementation on RTI.
sentences.cn: 随机对照试验有助于探索在呼吸道感染时使用维生素D的效应.

sentences.en: Rats in the two groups received trace element supplementation.
sentences.cn: 术后,微量元素行二组灌胃.

sentences.en: The most indicators mentioned above were obviously improved by supplementation with CMN for 6 weeks.
sentences.cn: 补充6周微量营养素的应激大鼠行为异常得到逆转,上述血液和组织的多数生化指标也出现明显改善.

sentences.en: The product provided inadequate vitamin and mineral supplementation.
sentences.cn: 这种产品不能充分补充维生素和矿物质。

sentences.en: Thus, the best source for cysteine supplementation is from cysteine - rich foodstuffs.
sentences.cn: 因此, 最理想的半胱氨酸补充剂还是来自富含半胱氨酸的食品.

sentences.en: Vitamins are involved in many embryonic processes – adequate supplementation is critical.
sentences.cn: 维生素参与多种胚胎发育过程-所以充分地补给至关重要.

sentences.en: Why is Trace Mineral Supplementation important to Dry Cows?
sentences.cn: 为何补充微量元素对妊娠母牛十分重要?

trans.tran_en: Supplementation is the use of pills or special types of food in order to improve your health
